thama shri lanka krikat pile nayakathwaya daru samaye kandayame siti jyeshta kridakayangen kisidu sahayogayak nolada bawa eeye (28) jathyanthara ek dina krikat pitiyata samu dun thilakarathna dilshan pawasayi.rangiri dambaulla krikat kridanganaye pawathi siya awasan tharangayen anathuruwa pawathwuna madhya hamuwe diyi ohu ema prakashaya kale.2011 aprel sita 2012 janawari dakwa thilakarathna dilshan shri lanka pile nayakathwaya daru athara dakunu aprikawata erehiwa test krikat jayak laba ganima hara ohu ge nayakathwaya yatathe shri lanka kandayamata suwisheshi jayagrahana labaganimata nohaki wiya.eeye dambaulla madhya hamuwe di thilakarathna dilshan kiya sitiye hiti hatiyema thama kandayamen iwath karanu labima sambandhayen itha kanagatuwata path wu bawayi.mahela jayawardhana saha kumar sangakkara nayakathwayen iwath wimen pasuwa thilakarathna dilshan nayakathwayata path keruna athara ohu dambaulla madhya hamuwe di wadi duratath sandahan kale kandayame nayakaya hatiyata thama eda prashna rasakata muhuna dun bawayi.'engalanthedi mage athata bolayak wadila thuwala wunama hitapu nayakayanta kiwwa nayakathwaya daranna kiyala, owun bahayi kiwwa' ohu athitha athdakim sihipath karamin pawasayi.nawaka kridakayan wenuwensiya nayakathwaya yatathe nawaka kridakayanta awasthawa laba dima atham ayata gataluwak wu bawa penwa dun thilakarathna dilshan ese handunwa dun nawakayan ada daksha lesa krida karanu daknata labima gana thama ada sathutu wana bawayi kiya sitiye.jyeshta kridakayange pamanak nowa atham puhunukaruwangen da kandayame nayakaya hatiyata thamata awashya sahayogaya nowu bawayi shri lanka kandayamen samu ganna supiri krikat kridakaya pawasanne.'mama nayakathwaya darapu awurudda purama anjalo mathiwsta aabadhayak thibuna.
mama danna kiyana panchikawaththe yakada bisnas karana sara mahaththayata , kalakata pera apen wishrama giya jayawardhana mahaththayatada katha kalemi.
